sen.j: うぐいす餡（うぐいすあん、鶯餡）とは、グリーンピースを茹でたものを潰して、砂糖または蜜で甘い味をつけた緑色の漉し餡のこと。
sen.e: Uguisu-an is green koshian (pureed bean jam) made by crushing boiled green peas and sweetening with sugar or honey.
Uguisu-an is a green smooth bean paste made by crushing boiled green peas and sweetening with sugar or honey.
Uguisu-an is a green smooth bean paste made by crushing boiled green peas and sweetening with sugar or honey.

sen.j: 和菓子やあんぱんの材料。
sen.e: It's an ingredient for Japanese confectionery and an-pan (a round soft bread including bean jam in its center).
It's one ingredient of Japanese confectionery and an-pan (a round soft bread with bean paste in the center).
It's one ingredient of Japanese confectionery and an-pan (a round soft bread with bean paste in the center).
